title: Glance Analytics Watch Face
summary: Showing Google Analytics metrics on your Android Watch as a Watch Face.
description: Do you check your Google Analytics stats a lot? Now the metrics are available right on your watch face, all the time. Are there some other number you care about a lot? You could track them on Google analytics and show them on your smart watch.Setup: 1. Open the phone app and select the analytics web property.2. Select "Analytics Watch Face" on your Android Wear companion app or on the watch. It may take a few minutes before the watch face show up after install.This is an early version to get feedback. A lot more improvements to come. Comments welcome. Contact me on http://www.twitter.com/glance_able
descriptionHTML:
Do you check your Google Analytics stats a lot? Now the metrics are available right on your watch face, all the time.
Are there some other number you care about a lot? You could track them on Google analytics and show them on your smart watch.

Setup:
1. Open the phone app and select the analytics web property.
2. Select "Analytics Watch Face" on your Android Wear companion app or on the watch. It may take a few minutes before the watch face show up after install.

This is an early version to get feedback. A lot more improvements to come. Comments welcome. Contact me on http://www.twitter.com/glance_able
comments: Can't get this to install on Gear 2 Would love this app if it worked..
recentChanges: Added a chart dashboard. You can select the metric to plot from the phone app.
